pullRequest.title: Improvements to scoped storage
pullRequest.bodyText:
This patch updates scoped storage, making the following changes:

only force copying on Android 11 (sdk 30) and above. Before, this was
also enabled for Android 10 (sdk 29).
disable the advanced settings move option to copy to /sdcard on
Android 30 and above (since it doesn't make sense anymore).
warn people on Android 29 when they try to explicitly use /sdcard
that data might not remain accessible on future Android versions.
show warning before asking for external sdcard permissions if
required.

Fixes #1478.
